definition: Aksobhya, the imperturbable ruler of Eastern Paradise, Abhirati
east/host (i.e. sitting on east side of guest)/landlord

square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter
abbr. for Afghanistan 阿富汗[A1 fu4 han4]
prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity/used in transliteration/also pr. [a4]
crowd/transliteration of Sanskrit 'kso', e.g. Aksobhya Buddha 阿閦佛
